Articles.Content:
Post here if you like Airships!

Don't forgot to install Ludodyne or Hooligan Labs Plugins.

Now, let's think how to put a Blimp into the atmosphere of a another planet.

Also check out my Jump from a Balloon challenge!

Current Question:

On what planets can you use Blimps? Because a Atmospheric Base on Jool would be very good!

They work well enough on Eve, getting the airship over there is a challenge though:

That's the only planet I've tried them on other then Kerbin

I suspect they'd work on Jool and Laythe, though since you can't land on Jool it shortens the mission life span..
